snippet: In Harlem, he plans three floors of exhibition space, one gallery a clean white box while others will retain their raw character.
abstract: Hilarie M Sheets Inside Art column; Gavin Brown is moving his West Village art gallery to larger space in Harlem.
lead_paragraph: In Harlem, he plans three floors of exhibition space, one gallery a clean white box while others will retain their raw character.

headline.main: Gavin Brown Moving Gallery to Harlem
